abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, making his third public appearance in right-leaning Staten Island, tangles with man who questions his ideas; some borough residents at event to publicize city's plan to repave roads are brusque and curt with de Blasio.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio, who has long struggled to connect with Staten Islanders, engaged with a man who questioned his policies, and others at the event were often unkind in their appraisals of him.

headline.main: Staten Islanders Give Mayor de Blasio Cold Shoulder in Rare Visit
headline.print_headline: S.I. Residents Give Mayor Cold Shoulder in Rare Visit

snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio, who has long struggled to connect with Staten Islanders, engaged with a man who questioned his policies, and others at the event were often unkind in their appraisals of him.
